Name: Dragon Fruit (PH)
Description: The fruit is sweet and acidic, and it's seeds give its inner pulp a crunchy texture.

DescriptionLocalization.ko: The fruit is sweet and acidic, and it's seeds give its inner pulp a crunchy texture.
DescriptionLocalization.de: Die Frucht ist süß und sauer, und ihre Samen verleihen ihrem Fruchtfleisch eine knusprige Textur.

DescriptionLocalization.pt: The fruit is sweet and acidic, and it's seeds give its inner pulp a crunchy texture.
DescriptionLocalization.ru: Сладкий плод с кислинкой. Семена внутри придают его мякоти хрустящую текстуру.
